purpleculture_pinyin:
huān
joyous; happy; pleased
радостный; счастливый; довольный
rtega_mnemonic:
歡歡RS
欢欢		歓happy, pleased, glad, joy, to enjoy
  • man with open mouth 欠 like a noisy bird 雚: he's happy and enjoying himself
  • modf. 歡 → 歓
  • ⓢ hand 又 which lacks 欠 nothing
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 欢)
Synonym: 喜 樂
Antonyms: 悲
Pictophonetic: 雚 indicates the sound; 欠 (breathe) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
歡迎 [ huān yíng ]: to welcome; welcome
歡樂 [ huān lè ]: gaiety; gladness; glee; merriment; pleasure; happy; joyous; gay
歡喜 [ huān xǐ ]: happy; joyous; delighted; to like; to be fond of
歡呼 [ huān hū ]: to cheer for; to acclaim
歡快 [ huān kuài ]: cheerful and lighthearted; lively
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 雚 [ guàn ] heron; small cup
    • 欠 [ qiàn ] to lack, to owe; to breathe, to yawn
heisig_chinese_memo: The stork lacks delivery orders so is joyous sitting in the office with his feet on the desk and hat tilted over his eyes.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If she yawns then your crotch is not making your wife feel joyous.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " less ", " Guan " sound, the original meaning is happiness, joy. "Shuowen": "Happy. From the owe to the sound." "Shu‧Luogao": "Public meritorious generals can only be happy." Kong Yingdashu: "Public merit has been advanced and great, the world is the merit of Le Gong , Respect and joy."

" Huan " can mean friendship . "Historical Records-Tian Jingzhong Ending the Family": "Yang Sheng Su and Qi Huan."

" Huan " also refers to each other for men and women in love. "Yuefu Poetry Collection-Wu Sheng Songs 1st Midnight Songs 4th": "Since Don't Huan, I can't open the scorpion."

" Huan " can also mean vigor, such as "the more you sing, the more happy you are." Tang Wangya, "Autumn by Qiu Si Zhan Yuan": "No one is seen by the side of the horse-walking platform.
humanum_short_description_en: From the " less ", " Guan " sound, the original meaning is happiness, joy.
humanum_full_description:
從「欠」，「雚」聲，本義為快樂、喜悅。《說文》：「喜樂也。从欠，雚聲。」 《書‧洛誥》：「公功肅將祗歡。」孔穎達疏：「公功已進且大矣，天下皆樂公之功，敬而歡樂。」

　　「歡」可表示交好。《史記‧田敬仲完世家》：「陽生素與乞歡。」

　　「歡」還表示相愛男女的互稱。《樂府詩集‧吳聲歌曲一‧子夜歌之四》：「自從別歡來，奩器了不開。」

　　「歡」還可表示起勁，如「越唱越歡」。唐王涯〈秋思贈遠〉：「走馬臺邊人不見，拂雲堆畔戰初歡。」
humanum_short_description: 從「欠」，「雚」聲，本義為快樂、喜悅。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
歡 (Simplified: 欢)
Pinyin: huān
English Definition: joyous; happy; pleased
Synonym: 喜 樂
Antonyms: 悲
Total strokes: 22; Radical: 欠
Pictophonetic: 雚 indicates the sound; 欠 (breathe) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 雚 [ guàn ] heron; small cup
    • 欠 [ qiàn ] to lack, to owe; to breathe, to yawn
Example Words:
歡迎 [ huān yíng ]: to welcome; welcome
歡樂 [ huān lè ]: gaiety; gladness; glee; merriment; pleasure; happy; joyous; gay
歡喜 [ huān xǐ ]: happy; joyous; delighted; to like; to be fond of
歡呼 [ huān hū ]: to cheer for; to acclaim
歡快 [ huān kuài ]: cheerful and lighthearted; lively
More: 歡* | *歡 | *歡*

HSK 1: 歡,欢
歡歡RS
欢欢 		歓 happy, pleased, glad, joy, to enjoy
  • man with open mouth 欠 like a noisy bird 雚: he's happy and enjoying himself
  • modf. 歡 → 歓

(Simplified: 欢)
Chinese Definition: Synonym: 喜 樂
Antonyms: 悲
Pictophonetic: 雚 indicates the sound; 欠 (breathe) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 雚 [ guàn ] heron; small cup
    • 欠 [ qiàn ] to lack, to owe; to breathe, to yawn
①快樂，高興：歡樂。歡慶。歡會。歡快。歡顏。盡歡而散。鬱鬱寡歡。
②喜愛，亦指所喜愛的人：心歡。新歡舊識。
③活躍，起勁，旺盛：歡蹦亂跳。歡實。機器轉得真歡。

歡呼 [ huān hū ]: to cheer for; to acclaim

(Simplified: 欢)
Chinese Definition: Synonym: 喜 樂
Antonyms: 悲
Pictophonetic: 雚 indicates the sound; 欠 (breathe) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 1
Chinese: The stork lacks delivery orders so is joyous sitting in the office with his feet on the desk and hat tilted over his eyes.
Meaning: joyous
Hanzi: 欢
Story: If she yawns then your crotch is not making your wife feel joyous.
Kind: traditional

從「 欠 」，「 雚 」聲，本義為快樂、喜悅。《說文》：「喜樂也。从欠，雚聲。」 《書‧洛誥》：「公功肅將祗歡。」孔穎達疏：「公功已進且大矣，天下皆樂公之功，敬而歡樂。」 「 歡 」可表示交好。《史記‧田敬仲完世家》：「陽生素與乞歡。」 「 歡 」還表示相愛男女的互稱。《樂府詩集‧吳聲歌曲一‧子夜歌之四》：「自從別歡來，奩器了不開。」 「 歡 」還可表示起勁，如「越唱越歡」。唐王涯〈秋思贈遠〉：「走馬臺邊人不見，拂雲堆畔戰初歡。」
From the " less", " Guan" sound, the original meaning is happiness, joy. "Shuowen": "Happy. From the owe to the sound." "Shu‧Luogao": "Public meritorious generals can only be happy." Kong Yingdashu: "Public merit has been advanced and great, the world is the merit of Le Gong , Respect and joy." " Huan" can mean friendship. "Historical Records-Tian Jingzhong Ending the Family": "Yang Sheng Su and Qi Huan." " Huan" also refers to each other for men and women in love. "Yuefu Poetry Collection-Wu Sheng Songs 1st Midnight Songs 4th": "Since Don't Huan, I can't open the scorpion." " Huan" can also mean vigor, such as "the more you sing, the more happy you are." Tang Wangya, "Autumn by Qiu Si Zhan Yuan": "No one is seen by the side of the horse-walking platform.

歡字的基本解释

歡
huān
见“欢”。

歡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huān］
［《廣韻》呼官切，平桓，曉。］
亦作“孉2”。亦作“懽1”。“欢1”的繁体字。
(1)快乐，喜悦。
(2)谓使欢乐。
(3)情谊；欢心。
(4)交好；融洽。
(5)相爱男女的互称。
(6)酣畅；起劲。
(7)古代吴地称造帆为欢。
(8)用壮语唱的山歌。

歡字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【欠字部】　歡； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页573第12
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?呼官切，音讙。【說文】喜樂也。【徐曰】喜動聲氣，故从欠。【禮·檀弓】啜菽飮水盡其歡。又【樂記】欣喜歡愛，樂之官也。亦作懽。【孝經·孝治章】故得萬國之懽心，以事其先王。　又作驩。【孟子】驩虞如也。【前漢·王褒傳】驩然交欣。　又合歡，漢殿名。【班固·西部賦】後宮則有合歡增成。又樹名。【崔豹·古今注】合歡樹似梧桐，枝葉繁，互相交結，樹之階庭，使人不忿。又竹名。【僧贊寧·筍譜】雙稍竹出九疑山，筍長，獨莖。及生枝葉卽分爲兩梢，謂之合歡竹。又橘名。【廣輿記】荆州江陵有合歡橘。　又歡伯，酒也。【焦氏易林】酒爲歡伯，除憂來樂。　又【韻補】叶許元切，音暄。【魏韋誕·親蠶頌】同碩慶于生民，發三靈之永歡。苞繁祐于萬國，卷福釐以言旋。　【集韻】或作孉。亦作〈女歡〉。

歡字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
歡字的起名意思

暂无。

Happy

Happy
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huān］
["Guang Yun" Call the official cut, Ping Huan, Xiao. ]
Also known as "孉2". Also known as "Huan 1". Traditional characters for "欢1".
(1) Happiness, joy.
(2) That is to make joy.
(3) Friendship; joy.
(4) Friendship; harmony.
(5) The mutual name of men and women who love each other.
(6) Healthy; vigorous.
(7) In ancient Wu, sailing was called Huan.
(8) Folk songs sung in Zhuang language.
Happy
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Own Words] 　huan; Kangxi strokes: 22; Page number: page 573 No. 12
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Call the official cut, the sound is 讙. [Said the text] Joy is also. [Xu Yue] I am so happy, so I owe it. 【Rite·Tan Gong】Sip stalks and simmer in water to make fun of it. Also [Le Ji] Xin likes love, the official of music. Also make joy. 【The Book of Filial Piety·Chapter of Xiaozhi】So it is the favor of all nations to serve as the first king.　Join again. [Mencius] Huanyu Ruye. 【Previous Han·Wang Bao Chuan】Happily and happily.　Hehuan again, the name of the Han Dian. [Banggu·Western Fu] In the harem, there is an acacia growth. Also tree name. 【Cui Bao·Annotation from Ancient to Modern】Albizia tree is like phoenix tree, with many branches and leaves, intertwining with each other. Also bamboo name. 【Seng Zanning·Bamboo Species】Shuangshao bamboo emerges from Jiuyu Mountain, with long shoots and single stems. And the raw branches and leaves are divided into two shoots, called Albizia. Also known as orange. [Guang Yu Ji] There are acacia oranges in Jiangling, Jingzhou.　Uncle Huan, wine too. 【Jiao Shi Yi Lin】The wine is the Huan Bo, and it is easy to be happy.　[Rhyme Filling] Ye Xu Yuan cut, sound Xuan. [Weiwei Birthday·Sericulture Song] Celebrate with the people, and send the three spirits forever joy. Bao Fan blesses all nations, rolls Fu Li with words.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo Wo. Also known as "Female Huan".
